name: ManageConversation
description:
Manage and update conversation statuses or assignments.

Use this tool to close, snooze, open, or assign conversations to an admin or team. It helps in efficiently managing conversation workflows and statuses.

parameters.name: conversation_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation in Intercom.

value_schema.description: The identifier for the conversation as given by Intercom.

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specifies the version of the Intercom API to use. Choose from available versions: 1.0 to 2.9.

parameters.name: conversation_update_request
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the action (close, snooze, open) or assignment (admin/team) for the conversation.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

parameters.description: The identifier for the conversation as given by Intercom.
